LIBFLIAPI FLISetBitDepth

(flidev_t dev, flibitdepth_t bitdepth)

Set the gray-scale bit depth for a given camera.

Documentation

Set the gray-scale bit depth for a given camera. This function sets the gray-scale bit depth of camera dev to bitdepth. The bitdepth parameter is either FLI_MODE_8BIT for 8-bit mode or FLI_MODE_16BIT for 16-bit mode.
Parameters:
dev - Camera to set the bit depth of.
bitdepth - Gray-scale bit depth: FLI_MODE_8BIT or FLI_MODE_16BIT.
Returns:
Zero on success.
Non-zero on failure.
See Also:
flibitdepth_t
FLIExposeFrame
